attributes.action: Put more stringent controls on imigration.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More stringent controls are needed to slow the influx of people from oversea's who do not have anything to offer the UK. We need to be more like Australia, where you cannot emigrate to unless you have something to offer to the country and have means of supporting yourself. The UK does not have the space or resources to support these people.
